scripts.build: yarn run compile:contracts && yarn workspace ui run build
scripts.lint: yarn wsrun --exclude oracle-e2e --exclude ui-e2e --exclude poa-parity-bridge-contracts lint
scripts.test: yarn run compile:contracts && yarn wsrun --exclude monitor --exclude oracle-e2e --exclude ui-e2e test
scripts.import:contracts: yarn workspace oracle run import:contracts && yarn workspace ui run import:contracts && yarn workspace monitor run import:contracts
scripts.prepare:contracts: yarn run compile:contracts && yarn run import:contracts
scripts.install:deploy: cd contracts/deploy && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install --silent
